title: An Author's Guide to Monsters
description: Do you like monsters? Do you wish to learn more about them, but don't know where to start? Well, this guide is for you! What began as a college assignment has turned into a passion project, meant to summarize months of research. Whether you're a seasoned monster enthusiast or a curious novice, Nevaeh Rynâ€™s debut release is an introductory guide that has you covered. Learn about 10 different monsters, from aliens to zombies, and expand your knowledge of the supernatural.
author: Nevaeh Ryn
